did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Peter Seitz Arbitration Files, 1954-1983
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
These arbitration files are coded to indicate what is included in the file:
TR = Transcript(s)
B = Brief
EX = Exhibit(s)
AN = Arbitrator's Notes
RC = Routine Correspondence
A = Agreement
SD = Supporting Document(s)

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York (N.Y.). Department of Social Services
International Union of Electrical, Radio and Machine Workers
International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace, and Agricultural Implement Workers of America. Local 300

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Peter Seitz Arbitration Files #5733. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
